Key Match Events: Alperen Şengün recorded a double-double with 26 points, 10 rebounds, six assists, and two steals.
Jalen Green erupted for 22 of his game-high 29 points in a pivotal third quarter.
Amen Thompson added 20 points and 15 rebounds.
Fred VanVleet dished out 19 points and 12 assists.
The Rockets overcame a sluggish start and trailed 28-16 after the first quarter.
Houston narrowed the gap with a 10-0 run capped by a Thompson dunk in the second quarter.
Green’s buzzer-beating three-pointer pushed Houston to a 57-55 lead at halftime.
The Rockets posted 40 points in the third quarter, fueled by Green and Şengün’s combined brilliance.
Houston turned 18 Washington turnovers into 35 points, extending their lead to as much as 26.
